hero.title: MediFind+
hero.subtitle: A platform helps people make smarter, safer healthcare decisions

problem.title: Problem
problem.source: Source data: Ministry of Health Vietnam, WHO

stats.worldwide_desc: Vietnam ranks 11th worldwide in antibiotic consumption
stats.western_pacific_desc: Vietnam ranks 2nd in the Western Pacific region with the most deaths due to antibiotic resistance

global.title: Global
global.description: According to WHO, antibiotic resistance is increasing and is just as dangerous as the COVID-19 pandemic.
global.deaths: Every year, about 700,000 people die globally because of antibiotic resistance. This number could increase to 10 million people by 2050 ~ such as coughing or just a cut on the skin can cause death.

about.title: About Us
about.founded: MediFind was founded by a group of students from Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology and University of Economics Ho Chi Minh city (UEH)
about.description: MediFind is an app that uses artificial intelligence technologies to figure out which medicines are in a picture or written text of a prescription. It then gives tips on how to safely take these medicines and advice that fits just right for each person's health needs.
about.features: The app also has extra helpful features like reminders to take your medicine, a chat feature to ask questions, and a map to find nearby pharmacies, all to make using the app easier and better for everyone.
about.first_in_vietnam: MediFind is the first application in Vietnam that allows users to recognize prescriptions through images and digital letters.

items: OCR, NLP and LLM technique
Big Data Analytics

data.title: Datasets from
data.umls: UMLS - Unified Medical Language System (~150k records)

solving.title: Solving an alarming problem
solving.description: Recognize antibiotics from all printed words and analyse its dosages

research.title: Recreating models from scratch
research.description: Utilize various advanced technologies to create our own model
research.paper: Public paper in 17th Advanced Computing and Analytics 2023

architecture.description: MediFind's central architecture is based on two stages: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and Natural Language Processing (NLP). By combining VietOCR and spaCy, and after a careful fine-tuning process, we have achieved a high degree of accuracy in identifying the names of medicines and antibiotics.

government.title: Government-backed communication campaigns
government.description: Healthcare requires trust - official endorsements accelerate adoption and position MediFind as a safe, credible, nationally aligned platform.

university.title: Medical-university partnerships

pharmacy.title: Pharmacy and clinic integrations
pharmacy.description: Every physical touchpoint from blister packs to store counters becomes a conversion point.

gamification.title: Gamification
gamification.description: Daily rewards drive long-term engagement, turning health routines into a consistent habit.

items.title: Government and University Collaborations
items.description: Running sponsored health campaigns with government and medical universities to drive revenue and nationwide adoption.

items.title: B2B Pharma Partnerships

items.title: Commissions from Clinics and Pharmacies

items.title: Digital Health Services
items.description: Online doctor consultations, personalized care plans and premium features.

differentiator.title: Point of difference
differentiator.subtitle: MediFind is the first application in Vietnam that allows users to recognize prescriptions through images and digital letters.

items.title: Free for first phase
items.description: MediFind does not collect money from users - suitable in Vietnam.

items.title: Fast & Precise
items.description: Identify medications through images and text instead of typing. Accurate ratio: ~95%

items.title: Multifunctional Application
items.description: Provide advanced features such as reminder, chatbot, pharmacies suggestions.

items.title: Up-to-date Technology

items.title: Customer behavior education
items.description: Create a points system where users earn and redeem points for vouchers, encouraging daily use.
